name: AppsFerry
summary: The AppsFerry SDK for iOS data statistics and user authentication.
description:
The AppsFerry SDK for iOS provides:
* The Data Kit mainly includes two key capabilities: autotrack data statistics and custom data statistics.
* The Login Kit is an application scenario of the AppsFerrySDK.It includes user login, through mobile phone number, email, tourist mode and other thirdparty platforms such as Google, Facebook, Snapchat and Tiktok.
